channel.title: Remove Reputation
channel.description:
It only does damage. I've seen so many 200 reppers who are so dumb and ill assume modified one small thing in a server, or leaked someone elses then gets all this respect so they can use it as an axe on the lower repped ones.
More people with 10 rep are intelligent than the 200 ones (at least in moparscape)
so i think remove it.

item.title: Remove Reputation
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

Agreed,it’s pretty much useless.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Reputation
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Encouraging, post:32, topic:279043”]Agreed all the way.
Idiots with 100+ reputation don’t know simple java.

Examples (Dragonchain, jc00295 (i don’t know his name, and don’t care) )

I don’t know them guys, but could tell from their posts.[/quote]
It’s not nice to flame others only because you don’t know what a boolean is; just go learn some Java. All you’ve said in your recent/most posts are ‘leeched!!!’…

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Reputation
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

I think rep should be more complicated and harder to abuse! Maybe only have designated “Rep Givers” so noobs won’t be like “ZOMFG! Tahks f0r diggzing up dis pimpscape for ma cuz i was t0o lazy ta does it myself… Has sum undeservered rep+++!”

I mean honestly maybe raise the rep requirement from 15 to like 50 or at least a higher number…

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Reputation
item.dc:creator: @Beast43 Beast43
item.description:
@Beast43 wrote:

marcbob:

ya im still 10 rep and have done everything a mod does and more. I see s many 200repers with leeched things and people who rep them dont know they leeched

Who?
The highest rep biggest leacher ive seen is Public Boolean no offence to him.

Wait, Wait theres a bigger one! Berky. Leeching bulby and getting 50k veiws by doing nothing.

Only thing added was leeched from gods army.

And im in favor of this because i know that people who deserve will get it back.

Sounds weird but when i released two things i was 200 rep and ive got a few pages of extra rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Reputation
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Newty:

I doubt it will be removed. However, it has been reset before and a selected few were given 50 rep to give out as they saw fit, I see this happening again in the near future.

Horray for someone who’s been there when it mattered! What Newty says is correct. It’s been reset before and it doesn’t matter. There was even a limit put on it because Silab was reaching like 400-500 (she’s probably closer to 2000 now). The first reset also involved people not being able to rep others initially, but only earning it through people with 15 and over. No matter what system you incorporate, it really cannot work at this site. The members here don’t understand how to use it and will therefore abuse it.

I am in all support of the system being removed. But please don’t forget why it’s here in the first place (Kaitnieks, etc).

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Reputation
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

that everyone can see (at the bottom of the post) who thanked the person for their post.[/quote]
